alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 6:54AM AKST until March 10 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and additional ice accumulations of a trace. Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph, gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While snow is expected to be the dominant precipitation type, a mix of rain and freezing rain is expected as warm air moves into the Kuskokwim Delta region early this morning. The rain and freezing rain should be fairly brief as the cold air is expected to return. All precipitation should come to an end around 9 AM this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
